resources.string: Default settings are used before you set up your customized profile. For more accurate BAC calculations, please update your profile.

This app was created to help hokies to monitor thier drinking, by keeping track of thier standard drinks.We use a BAC Calculator to estimate your BAC and a Reaction time game to test your reaction time.

Party Positive Zone BAC = .06 
 Legal Driving Zone BAC U+003C = .08 
 Danger Zone BAC U+003C = .10
